__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on your friendly neighborhood installer '''ubiquity'''! 

After you have improved a bug report put your '''Launchpad Id''' in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged. 

=== Tools ===

For doing your work easier during the hug days remember to use the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuBugDay/Tools|hugday-tools]]</nowiki>.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===

To sign up for 5-A-Day participation, please add your Launchpad ID to the Participants column. (This is not the email address you used for signing up for LP, but the last part of the URL that https://launchpad.net/people/+me redirects you to (everything behind the ~ sign)):

   1. Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
   2. Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID. 

Also sign up here: https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day-participants/+join

=== 150 New Bugs ===
'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* If the bug is missing steps to recreate it:
** Request the needed info
** Subscribe to the bug 
** Set the status to Incomplete
** Please do not close these bugs if the developer has looked at them. They will close them when they are finished with them.
* If the bug has steps to recreate it:
** Recreate the bug
** Document any missing steps
** Improve the bug report (better title?)
** Comment on the bug regarding which ISO and version of ubiquity you used
** Set the bug status to Confirmed
